models

Class ScheduledIncome

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.ScheduledIncome

  • public class ScheduledIncome
extends java.lang.Object
    ScheduledIncome Creates Income instances based on a user specified date and repetition period. Invoked by the Schedule Actor on a period specified in Global

      Scheduled Task is run daily to ensure that scheculed Incomes are added periodically on a user specified period given on creation.
      boolean update(long scheduledIncomeId)
      Updates a scheduled income and, income instances created by that scheduled income Income instances are updated if they were created after the date in the schedueled income object.
